jcr:root.jcr:title: andrew.schaeffer@trashymail.com POST on Enjoying the redwoods

object.jcr:description: It’s not that bad, if you are used to hiking with an overnight pack on your back. I actually like the feel of carrying weight on my back for some reason (even with biking, too….I know I’m strange) so I didn’t have any problems. It never got too steep to ruin the experience, that’s for sure. Plus, the scenery along the way is incredible so you’ve got plenty of distractions.
